name: Sandbox Racing Simulator
description:
Build your custom racecar and tune it to perfection. 

Over 30 unique items and paints to truly create a custom racecar. Race to progress.

Formula 1, Formula Drift, Rally, Off-road are all possible. This is a sandbox racing simulator and everything is up to your imagination.

Features include:  

~ 3 engines with different stats and unique gearboxes, 3 turbos with other spooling and blow off valve stats, 3 wheel types (racetrack, rally, off-road).

~ Aerodynamics: Functional aerodynamics to create downforce (or lift) for the perfect racecar.

~ Replay history: Every time you complete a race a replay will spawn and race alongside you. A scoreboard will track your times so you can see your improvements.

~ Engines + turbos: final drive adjusting, backfire tuning, turbo boost limits

~ Wheels: tire-pressure, camber,  suspension height, steering (or not), connected to drivetrain (or not).

~ Drivers' Seat: Manual + Automatic gearbox controls, steering speed + angle

~ Headlight + Taillight: Custom placement and functionality

Features to add/fix (feel free to leave a comment):

~ Multiplayer

~ Bug: If wheels offset breaks, just restart the game.

~ Bug: Use Alt + F4 to close the game.
